description.p: **Note: This is a community package of RemNote. It is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by RemNote Inc.**
RemNote is an all-in-one learning tool that combines note-taking, knowledge management, flashcards, and spaced repetition to enable effective and efficient learning.

ul.li: Notes, Docs & Outlines: Capture and link ideas for long-term knowledge management
Smart Flashcards: Create flashcards directly from your notes
Spaced Repetition: Build long-term memory with proven study intervals
Linked References: Review all notes connected to a topic with contextual links
PDF Annotation: Highlight, annotate, and create flashcards from documents
Multimedia Embedding: Incorporate videos, documents, and more into notes
Tags: Organize notes, to-dos, and multimedia materials
LaTeX Formulas: Create and edit mathematical formulas inline
Code Blocks: Keep programming notes separate from code
Import & Sync: Bring data from any note-taking app
Offline Mode: Work without internet connection

description.p: Perfect for students, researchers, and lifelong learners who want to build lasting knowledge while cutting study time in half.
